Reviews.Title: Great DVR
Reviews.Author: Mytana
Reviews.Content: I can view my house from iphone, This DVR record live video from 8 cameras, and backup the hard disk. It comewith 1000GB hard drive, which is excellent. Most other DVR come with 1500GB hard drive. My original purpose is to view video remotely over the internet, so I can watch my baby and the nanny. The unit was received fast. But the setup took some times. Connectin the cameras to the DVR was easy. But the remote access setup was tough. I contacted seller and they provided the link to download the software. Finally, I can watch the images from my cell phone. This is a great feature.

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Bullfrog77
Reviews.Content: Broke after 2 months, and didn't realize it.  No customer service to help set up, nor for warranty calls, and apparently only a 3 month warranty according to paperwork.  Not very happy about this purchase.

Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: repeat buyer
Reviews.Content: This unit uses the cheapes APP on the marker and is barely recognizable. The PTZ function doesn't work and the quality of replay is awful.  This unit is way over priced and shoudl not be sold in the USA legally
